Reviews.Title: good basic tv
Reviews.Author: Amazon Junkie
Reviews.Content: Good size, good quality.If you want a basic tv, nothing fancy, just an extra tv for whatever, this is a good buy. I bought one for the garage, because that's my exercise room and I can play my exercise videos there.The sound is good and loud, clear. The visual quality is good, I won't say great, just because well, when you compare it to a $400 tv that's like a plasma tv or something, it doesn't compare. BUT that said....for something basic, it's just perfect.The dvd works great. I love that I don't need to plug in anything, just stick the dvd in and and that's it. It plays automatically.

Reviews.Title: Very Good, But---
Reviews.Author: W. T. Towles
Reviews.Content: I bought this television for my office mainly for four reasons: its size, the built-in DVD player, the claim that it will maintain a constant volume from channel to channel, and the sound equalizer. A reasonable price also helped.It has met or exceeded expectations in all ways but one. The sound quality is poor--flat and tinny--and the equalizer cannot make the small and cheap internal speakers deliver near enough bass. I fixed the sound problem with a pair of external speakers (also from Amazon)--the Logitech X-140 2.0 speakers connected to the headphone jack on the side of the TV. They make a huge difference. So the total package of TV and speakers cost $281 with no shipping costs. Still not bad.TV setup was quick and easy and the remote is nicely laid out. I especially like the mute button. Its shape and location make it easy to find even in the dark. I use mute buttons a lot.Without the external speakers, I give the TV 4 stars. With the speakers, the combo gets 5.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I ordered
Reviews.Author: Lauren
Reviews.Content: Good size, and the DVD drive is very handy on the top of the TV. Picture and sound are good.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Timing
Reviews.Author: M. Riffel
Reviews.Content: My wife wanted a simple TV with a DVD player to watch her exercise videos while she worked out. There is no TV connection in the exercise room so I only needed to worry about the DVD portion. I also need to find a Birthday/Anniversary/Valintines Day gift, which is no easy task after 45 years of marriage. This unit was about $70 more than the no-name brands but got much better ratings.  I figured that the extra money might be worth it.  When she gets tired of working out (if you can call that wiggling around a workout)...in a few weeks... I'll use it to replace our small 15" monitor on the spare computer. At least she was happy with her gift and now I'm happy for another year....what the heck will I get her next year....UGHHHH!

Reviews.Title: a warranty that's not a warranty
Reviews.Author: M. C. "mahniah"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Magnavox TV and it came in a box that had been opened and was taped closed.  Looking back, I should have just sent it back.  But I set it up and right away there was a problem -- the sound goes off whenever it feels like it, and I have to turn the TV off and then on again.  That sometimes starts the sound, and sometimes, after it's turned on again, there's also no picture.  As you can imagine, it's a real nuisance. I contacted the dealer, and DataVision said they can't do anything, and to contact Magnavox directly, which I then did.Magnavox will not replace it with a new TV, but only with a refurbished TV.  Well, that's not so bad.  But they tell me that the process takes 2-3 months.  It starts with Magnavox sending me packing material in which to return the TV.  When they receive it, it will take a 2-3 weeks to process, and then they'll send out a  refurbished TV.  I've already gotten rid of my old TV, so I'll be without one for 3 or more weeks - no telling.  I really don't want to have no TV for that long.  That doesn't seem like much of a warranty.I hope they start including the warranty info on the product website - it would have been helpful to know that if I get a product that doesn't work properly, it will be replaced with a refurbished one in 2-3 mos.  I'll be more careful about warranty info in the future.

Reviews.Title: At Last, a TV with sound
Reviews.Author: S. Mitchell "samintx"
Reviews.Content: I am so tired of getting TVs and the sound is so faint and no ordinary external speaker plugs. I do read the reviews here before ordering and appreciate the comments. I will say this TV has a DVD player, Lots of input ports and sound you can enjoy with external speakers but there is a connection for my Logitech twin speakers I got from Amz. The picture quality is very good but then I don't require extreme retina displays like an iPad. One thing I haven't found is on and off switch and other buttons to use on the TV without using the remote. Easy to setup and I'm a happy camper tonight.PS: on thing I don't like about this TV  ON AND OFF SWITCHES impossible to immediately find! They are underneath the front. You need (anyway I did) a flash light to see the words on the front bottom. Feel underneath and you will feel the buttons.Good price and Great Amz delivery!

Reviews.Title: it's ok, sound is poor tho
Reviews.Author: Denise Schroeder
Reviews.Content: Picture is just fine.  But the sound is weak and tinny.  But for the price it is just fine for the 2nd bedroom we purchased it for.  We are considering getting a sound bar to add for the sound issue, which would help enhance when we are/if watching movies.  For our needs, it was a good deal.

Reviews.Title: Great TV/VD Combo
Reviews.Author: Kathy
Reviews.Content: Great picture and sound. Simple to operate. Great choice.I searched a lot for a 22" TV/DVD Combo with clear picture, great colors and sound and the Magnavoz is surely the best around to fit all those features. I'm very happy with my purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great Value/Excellent Picture & Quality
Reviews.Author: pinkpeony "PinkPeony"
Reviews.Content: Great product, excellent quality, built in DVD is easy to use, only 1 power cord cable, beautiful picture, great size for a bedroom, purchased "NEW" only from Amazon & it arrived in perfect condition & was not damaged in shipping, awesome product!

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV/DVD COMBO
Reviews.Author: TV Don "avid viewer"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for the kitchen counter, it fits nicely under the cupboard.  The picture quality is very good, it has a customizable menu.  The sound quality is also very good, it has an equalizer. If you're looking for a good dvd player,I would recommend this TV, after all it's a Magnavox. some comments say the remote has no DVD eject button..it does!! Very happy with this product.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for Bedroom
Reviews.Author: Mary Ellen Ingegneri
Reviews.Content: I live in an apartment and didn't want an oversized TV for my bedroom or a TV that would require mounting to the wall, since I'm a renter.  This TV is perfect for such type rooms!  I also, didn't want to be bother with hooking up a DVD/Blueray either - so the attached DVD player was a wonderful purchase.It was easy to set the TV up especially the instant install, I've used the DVD player - easy enough! and it's picture perfect!

Reviews.Title: GREAT LITTLE TV; HORRIBLE STAND
Reviews.Author: Snowbird
Reviews.Content: I LOVE THIS LITTLE TV, WAS SOOOOO EASY TO COMPLETELY SETUP, IS MOST DEFINITELY A FIVE STAR TV.  BUT THEN SOMEONE SENT ALONG A POORLY DESIGNED STAND, ALMOST IMPOSSIBLE TO PUT IN THE 3 SCREWS WITH A REGULAR SCREWDRIVER AND ACUTE ARITHRITIC HANDS.  THE HOLE FOR THE THREE SCREWS COULD HAVE BEEN MADE MUCH LARGER FOR THE ATTACHING.  AND THEN WHEN THIS IS FINALLY COMPLETED, THE STAND IS WOBBLY WITH THE TV ON IT.BUT BACK TO THE TV, IT IS EXACTLY AS ORDERED AND MAKES A GREAT MONITOR FOR MY PC COMPUTER, TOO.  DID ATTACH THE LOGITECH SPEAKERS I ALREADY HAD WITH MY LAPTOP, SO SOUND AND PICTURE ARE NOW BETTER THAN EXPECTED AFTER READING SOME OF THE REVIEWS.OPENING THE BOX AND TAKING THE TV OUT COULD NOT HAVE BEEN EASIER.  NICE PACKAGING, NO FIGHTING IT.  A NICE INFORMATIVE MANUAL IS INCLUDED, BUT THE TV WENT RIGHT TO ONSCREEN SET UP AND I REALLY DIDN'T LOOK AT MANUAL UNTIL READY TO INSERT THE FIRST DVD.  WANTED TO MAKE SURE I WAS DOING IT RIGHT, SO DID INQUIRE OF THE MANUAL; HOWEVER, THAT COULD NOT HAVE BEEN EASIER, ALSO.  AND, ALSO, THE REMOTE IS EASY AND SELF EXPLANATORY.DO AGREE WITH THE ONE REVIEWER THAT SAID THE ON/OFF SWITCH IS A LITTLE HARD TO FIND THE FIRST TIME; IF HE/SHE HAD NOT SAID IN THEIR REVIEW WHERE IT WAS, I WOULD PROBABLY STILL BE LOOKING FOR IT.  BUT AGAIN THE REMOTE IS VERY EASY TO USE.WOULD BUY THIS UNIT AGAIN IF THE STAND IS IMPROVED.

Reviews.Title: So far...I like it!
Reviews.Author: J. Bertz
Reviews.Content: Bought this 12volt TV for our camper this fall. Easy install and the sound/picture is great. Have not used it much but as long as it lasts, I'll be very pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: edit monitor
Reviews.Author: Arthur Davidson "sam"
Reviews.Content: so far so good purchased for s video jack great picture to edit video tried tv just for the heck of it great picture almost as good as 1080

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: Morris W. West
Reviews.Content: Arrived on date indicated found to be a good tv. DVD player worked as idicated, easy to set up. For the price it was good. Wife was happy it was placed in kitchen and worked great.

Reviews.Title: Good smaller TV
Reviews.Author: Patti Higginbotham
Reviews.Content: I bought this for the kids to hook up to their Xbox.  It works perfect for this.  It has a nice picture and color.  Only thing that could be better is higher volume.

Reviews.Title: Better than Samsung!
Reviews.Author: Red in Ridgecrest
Reviews.Content: So far, so good.  Impressive sound compared to the Samsung - which sounded very tinny.  I don't have HD hookup so there is some graininess, but it's not bad at all after fiddling with the color, tone, brightness, sharpness,  etc.  And DVD's are really gorgeous.  I don't know why Consumer Reports lists Magnavox TV's poorly. FYI...there's no USB port on this model---sob. I bought this TV because of the reviews on Amazon, so I hope that my review can give someone else confidence.  I just hope it keeps working -  BTW....it did take 2 tries to get one that worked properly - had to return the first one.  But I'd still recommend it, now that I have one that works!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my exercise room
Reviews.Author: POL
Reviews.Content: I ordered this combo for my exercise room.  I needed a TV as well as DVD player.  There were not many dual products available at least with a recognized name.  This TV is great.  Sharp picture, sound even turned up is good, it is light weight.  I have it on a movable wall mount and it was easy and light enough to install by myself.  Very reasonably priced.  The shipper shipped in the orginial box and was delivered before the published delivery date.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Jan Burroughs
Reviews.Content: Wanted a TV for our kitchen.We wanted a name brand thinking maybe it would be a better quallity than the off brands and we were right. It's a great TV.Picture it good,sound is good and it was easy to hookup.We just love it.We have no complaints at all.Did'nt take long to get it either.Very happy with our purchase.

Reviews.Title: Horrible sound
Reviews.Author: L. Stoker
Reviews.Content: The tv is fantastic until you turn the sound up. It has horrible sound. My husband even tried to play around with the equalizer. Didnt help one bit. The only reason I didnt return this is because it was bought for my 2 year old son to watch dvd's when we actually want to watch tv on our living room tv. We really dont expect the tv to last forever so I figured it will work for now until he gets older.

Reviews.Title: Excelllent TV: Limited Remote
Reviews.Author: maddux31
Reviews.Content: The TV is great. The only problem was the remote didn't have an eject button for the built-in DVD player.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: sl
Reviews.Content: Very small, but good picture, and ability to format to the viewing size you want.  Must turn volume way up to hear..as the speaker projection is weak.  Love the dvd option...very good.  Overall, I like it.

Reviews.Title: TV was great, my own choice of size was not correct
Reviews.Author: Thayne Logan
Reviews.Content: I loved the TV set, but after setting it up in my living room, I had to return it for a replacement with the same item but a larger size.

Reviews.Title: Magnavox rocks!
Reviews.Author: touchedbydestiny
Reviews.Content: We got this for our camper and it works beautifully.  There are two holes in the base where you can screw it down to the surface, which we did and when we moved our camper it did not budge. Love the DVD player in it, which was great on our one rainy camping trip weekend.  Our six year old was content. I love Magnavox products we still have a floor model tv from 1996 and it still looks and sounds great!  So does this model.  Magnavox, you can't go wrong!

Reviews.Title: Excellent television
Reviews.Author: Pattie D. Adler
Reviews.Content: I am so happy with this television, it is just what I wanted.  The speakers are excellent, as is the picture quality.  The only unknown at this point is if the dvd player will hold up.  The dvd player mounted at the top is a very convenient location.  So easy to move around from room to room or to the RV.

Reviews.Title: Came quickly, a good deal and very nice space saving design
Reviews.Author: Nan Ratner
Reviews.Content: Perfect all in one design for small area. Came quickly and was well priced. Works well in room I exercise in.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product -- great add from Amazon!
Reviews.Author: parmstro
Reviews.Content: Was looking for a TV/CD viewer for not alot of $...this Magnavox 22" TV Combo was a great fit.  We got the Logitech speakers with it and between the picture quality and the enhanced sound, couldn't be happier.  Excellent buy.

Reviews.Title: Magnavox 22 inch TV/DVD Combo
Reviews.Author: Barbara E. Howser
Reviews.Content: Just had this TV connected to cable and seems to work great.  DVD player works good except it's a bit noisy.  However, you don't notice when it's playing  Use it for work outs and to escape the family...just for a tiny bit.

Reviews.Title: Works well and easy to set up.
Reviews.Author: berky
Reviews.Content: I have tested most of the features of this TV/DVD combo and they have all worked out well. The video is quite good - text is sometimes a little fuzzy at the edges but I believe that is because I have regular instead of HDTV satellite service. I read other comments about the quality of the sound. I needed to make adjustments to the sound in changing from programming types, but I believe the sound is okay to good. I am comparing to my old TV, a TV/VCR combo circa 1996.DVD playback is also good but I haven't tried out all the many features. The only thing I still need to work out is the reprogramming of my DirecTV remote to this TV - I'm sure I'll get it eventually because I have done this kind of reprogramming before.

Reviews.Title: A CAMPER'S DELIGHT
Reviews.Author: Happy Customer
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV Combo for camping with our popup camper and it has worked out to be the best investment for our trips.  The picture is awesome and having the ability to play DVDs when there is nothing on TV is just great.  The TV is lightweight so it is easy to move it in and out of the camper as needed.

Reviews.Title: TV so far so good
Reviews.Author: mw
Reviews.Content: Prompt shipping.  Box arrived undamaged.  Using rabbit ears so only receiving a few stations, but great picture on TV.  Sound is fine.  Have not yet tried dvd player.

Reviews.Title: Nice unit
Reviews.Author: NoName13
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up and use. The screen resolution is awesome for this unit. Very nice TV/DVD combo. I would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Just as described
Reviews.Author: Dee
Reviews.Content: No issues, no problems, clear picture, good value, meets all expectations. Easy to put stand on it. Operation is easy.
